name: The Sun Will Rise Again
description:
The Sun Will Rise Again

A B&W Jam Group Entry

Game Length

Less than 5 minutes

Controls
  • Move: WASD/ Arrows/ Left stick
  • Run: Alt/ Shift/ Right face button/ R1
  • Jump: Space/ Bottom face button
  • Crouch/Pickup: Ctrl/ E/ Left face button
Content Warning

Allusions to death, grief

Credits
  • Programming & Environment Art: jynell
  • Writing: jess
  • Character Art & Animation: rittzler
  • Music: fsnowdin (Listen to the soundtrack on SoundCloud)
